thread.section_title: All About Sex and Love | Best Sex Moves, Love Life Help, and Dating Advice From Cosmo
thread.title: 21 Jokes You'll Only Get if You're the Worst at Flirting
thread.title_full: 21 Jokes You'll Only Get if You're the Worst at Flirting

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: 21 Jokes You'll Only Get if You're the Worst at Flirting
text:
1. When it comes to flirting, you really don't know where to start.
normal people flirting: hey you're cute we should go out sometime (;
me trying to flirt: so do you like bread
‚Äî what (@chanelpuke) November 9, 2013 2. Ninety-nine percent of the time, your crushes have no idea you're hitting on them.
https://emopillow.tumblr.com/post/139548712322/flirts-by-avoiding-eye-contact-and-talking-to 3. You make it tough for people to get romantic with you.
http://bhlow.tumblr.com/post/91784851992/guy-i-need-you-like-oxygen-me-pure-oxygen-can 4. Your idea of enthralling conversation is bizarre animal facts over winky faces.
http://pikano.tumblr.com/post/87569159688/im-good-at-flirting 5. Talking to your crush = talking about the things you care about.
http://sleepysmolandsapphic.tumblr.com/post/135120601053/me-flirting-so-how-do-you-feel-about-the-movies 6. Tucking away your inner nerd is an impossible feat.
http://grxeek.tumblr.com/post/121160957317/me-trying-to-flirt 7. Half the time, you come off like you hate the person when you feel the opposite!
#guilty #me #sorry #notsorry #itswhoiam #asaperson #meflirting #bullies
A post shared by Amanda Salgado (@la_gr33neyes) on Oct 11, 2016 at 2:37pm PDT
 8. You are an expert at misusing emojis.
http://bennybab.tumblr.com/post/137724976315 9. No matter how hard you try, you can't really tone yourself down.
Me before a date: don't dress weird, don't act weird, don't say anything weird.
Me showing up to that date: pic.twitter.com/kgvDIP3pJX
‚Äî Michael Tiberi (@MichaelJTiberi) August 10, 2016 10. You are not the best at following cues.
Legit me as a girlfriend. #Ididntmakethis #butprettydamnclose #mycharm #justsaying #somedaymyprincewillcome #gfmeme #dating #datingmeme #toofunny #storyofmylife #texting #singlelife #livingitup #socalchick
A post shared by Jenna Hodge (Glimmer) (@jennalynnhodge) on Nov 15, 2016 at 12:28am PST
11. You can't figure out how everyone else seems to have an innate flirting gene.
http://cossu-reve.tumblr.com/post/111769356597/why-i-m-single 12. Because truthfully, you have no idea what you're doing.
I promise you! Lol I'm awkward as hell üòÇ #meflirting #awkwardintrovert
A post shared by Alexia Lael McDougald (@_lovely_lael__) on Feb 3, 2017 at 4:10pm PST
13. You relate to this guy so much more than you want to admit:
http://pokska.tumblr.com/post/57738881195/me-flirting-every-damn-time 14. You just have such a knack for saying the wrong thing at the wrong time, always.
http://a-gentleman-and-scholar.tumblr.com/post/99267382587/god-i-suck-at-sexting 15. If someone asks you what you're doing, you never lie and say, "Just in my underwear thinking of you ;)." You can't do it.
http://the-vexed-vortex.tumblr.com/post/110430186576 16. Because if the situation were reversed, it wouldn't take much to woo you.
I'll take that any day! Lol üòÑüòÇ #ihavefood #youcanhaveit #meflirting #fastestwaytomyheart #fitchickswayoflove
A post shared by Mayte Nicole (@maytenicolefit_) on May 20, 2015 at 12:14pm PDT
17. To you, relationship goals is being your true self, so why waste time not being yourself?
üòè Extended edition? üòè (THIS IS EXACTLY ME) . .
A post shared by Etil from Middle Earth (@etil_mistwen) on Jan 25, 2016 at 3:50pm PST
 18. After all, you want to attract someone with actual shared interests.
me flirting: so tell me a little bit about your dog
‚Äî Female Struggles (@NotesForGirlz) April 12, 2016 19. You're simply letting potential future partners know what you're about.
me sexting pic.twitter.com/NbZmWrabky
‚Äî no (@tbhjuststop) February 10, 2017 20. But in the meantime, the rules of flirting evade you.
http://catee.tumblr.com/post/148326454821/someone-flirts-with-me-me10-years-later-oh 21. Safe to say, you might never figure it out.
http://kaylicasandra.tumblr.com/post/117986482401/i-dont-flirt-i-panic Follow Julia on Twitter .
